column5: Hmmm, are there any OFC shirts floating 'round the net for sale?  I'd sport one or two... something funny with the OFC link on it...  Like, the evolution of a fisherman, you know, that monkey to man evolution diagrams... well, have some mokey, then go to cave man with a stick and line, then go to that photo that AdddiktedtoFishing ( or however you spell his name ) in his avatar... just an example...  Anyone feelin' deez vibes?
My avatar?  I love this picture...hehe...  Yeah, I'd for sure sport an OFC T-Shirt!
TJ has them...send him a blank cheque and he'll fix you up...or you could send him a PM..whichever.
A2F, you are certainly stylin'.  A cool graphic.
Hehehe... Thanks douG!  I found it a long time back on the internet doing a google images search
Cant find the pic .. but I seem to remember TJ sporting one that read .... Women want me - Fish Fear me !
